com.complexible.stardog.api
Interface ConnectionView<I extends Connection,O extends Connection>

public interface ConnectionView<I extends Connection,O extends Connection>

Interface to provide conversion of the 'view' of a connection to another type of connection. Used by Connection.as(java.lang.Class) to provide polymorphic views of a single connection which each provide different functionality over the base Connection. Views are always performed against the base SNARL connection.

Since:
0.7
Version:
0.7
Author:
Michael Grove

Method Summary
 O as(I theV)
          Transform the connection into the new view.
 boolean canView(Connection theConnection, Class<? extends Connection> theView)
          Return whether or not the provided type of connection can be viewed as the desired type.
 

Method Detail

as

O as(I theV)
                        throws com.complexible.stardog.StardogException
Transform the connection into the new view.

Parameters:
theV - the connection to change
Returns:
the view of the connection
Throws:
com.complexible.stardog.StardogException - if there was an error changing the view of the connection.

canView

boolean canView(Connection theConnection,
                Class<? extends Connection> theView)
Return whether or not the provided type of connection can be viewed as the desired type. If true, calls to as(I) will always succeed.

Parameters:
theConnection - the type of the connection whose view is to be changed
theView - the type of view we want.
Returns:
true if the connection can be viewed as the view class, false otherwise.
